document.full_text: with the help of trakus, which uses global positioning technology to keep track of every horse in a race, viewers can simulate what it was like for john velazquez as he rode animal kingdom to victory in the kentucky derby on saturday.
document.title: the rail: a jockey's view of the derby
lines_and_colors: with the help of trakus, which uses global positioning technology to keep track of every horse in a race, viewers can simulate what it was like for john velazquez as he rode animal kingdom to victory in the kentucky derby on saturday.
